verses.verse: Now in the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> by the mouth <WH6310> of Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> might be fulfilled <WH3615> <WH8800>, the YY <WH3068> stirred up <WH5782> <WH8689> the spirit <WH7307> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539>, that he made a proclamation <WH5674> <WH8686> <WH6963> throughout all his kingdom <WH4438>, and put it also in writing <WH4385>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539>, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of heaven <WH8064> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> me all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>; and he hath charged <WH6485> <WH8804> me to build <WH1129> <WH8800> him an house <WH1004> at Yerushalayim <WH3389>, which is in Y'hudah <WH3063>.

Who is there among you of all his people <WH5971>? His 'Elohim <WH430> be with him, and let him go up <WH5927> <WH8799> to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, which is in Y'hudah <WH3063>, and build <WH1129> <WH8799> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, (he <WH1931> is the 'Elohim <WH430>,) which is in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And whosoever remaineth <WH7604> <WH8737> in any place <WH4725> where he sojourneth <WH1481> <WH8802>, let the men <WH582> of his place <WH4725> help <WH5375> <WH8762> him with silver <WH3701>, and with gold <WH2091>, and with goods <WH7399>, and with beasts <WH929>, beside the freewill offering <WH5071> for the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430> that is in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

Then rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> the chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of Y'hudah <WH3063> and Binyamin <WH1144>, and the Kohanim <WH3548>, and the L'vi'im <WH3881>, with all them whose spirit <WH7307> 'Elohim <WH430> had raised <WH5782> <WH8689>, to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> to build <WH1129> <WH8800> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> which is in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And all they that were about <WH5439> them strengthened <WH2388> <WH8765> their hands <WH3027> with vessels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, with gold <WH2091>, with goods <WH7399>, and with beasts <WH929>, and with precious things <WH4030>, beside all that was willingly offered <WH5068> <WH8692>.

Also Cyrus <WH3566> the king <WH4428> brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> the vessels <WH3627> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, which Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> had brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and had put <WH5414> <WH8799> them in the house <WH1004> of his 'elohim <WH430>;

Havahn those did Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> bring forth <WH3318> <WH8686> by the hand <WH3027> of Mithredath <WH4990> the treasurer <WH1489>, and numbered <WH5608> <WH8799> them unto Sheshbazzar <WH8339>, the prince <WH5387> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.
And this is the number <WH4557> of them: thirty <WH7970> chargers <WH105> of gold <WH2091>, a thousand <WH505> chargers <WH105> of silver <WH3701>, nine <WH8672> and twenty <WH6242> knives <WH4252>,

Thirty <WH7970> basons <WH3713> of gold <WH2091>, silver <WH3701> basons <WH3713> of a second <WH4932> sort four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235>, and other <WH312> vessels <WH3627> a thousand <WH505>.

All the vessels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091> and of silver <WH3701> were five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967>. All these did Sheshbazzar <WH8339> bring up <WH5927> <WH8689> with them of the captivity <WH1473> that were brought up <WH5927> <WH8736> from Babylon <WH894> unto Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
